rport.desc: Port to attack on chosen IPs

users.desc: User (ie: 'admin'), range or file with them (ie: file:./bin/artifacts/dics/john.txt) to test

passwords.desc: Passwords (or file with them) to test

userAsPass.desc: Test the same user as password for each one

delay.desc: Delay between batches of requests, in ms.

concurrency.desc: Number of requests to do at the same time

timeout.desc: Time to wait for a response, in ms.
